Name: VMComputer
Description: Inventory data for servers collected by the Service Map and VM Insights solutions using the Dependency agent and Log analytics agent.

Properties.Name: TimeGenerated
Properties.Description: Date and time the record was created.

Properties.Name: Computer
Properties.Description: The name of the computer.

Properties.Name: AgentId
Properties.Description: Unique ID for the microsoft monitoring agent installed on the server.

Properties.Name: Machine
Properties.Description: AgentId with m- prepended.

Properties.Name: DisplayName
Properties.Description: The display name of the server.

Properties.Name: FullDisplayName
Properties.Description: The full display name of the server.

Properties.Name: HostName
Properties.Description: The host name of the server without domain.

Properties.Name: BootTime
Properties.Description: The boot time in UTC

Properties.Name: TimeZone
Properties.Description: The UTC timezone offset of the server.

Properties.Name: VirtualizationState
Properties.Description: Values will be Unknown Physical Virtual or Hypervisor

Properties.Name: Ipv4Addresses
Properties.Description: A list of the server's IPv4 addresses

Properties.Name: Ipv4SubnetMasks
Properties.Description: A list of the server's IPv4 subnet masks.

Properties.Name: Ipv4DefaultGateways
Properties.Description: A list of the server's IPv4 default gateways.

Properties.Name: Ipv6Addresses
Properties.Description: A list of the server's IPv6 addresses

Properties.Name: MacAddresses
Properties.Description: A list of the server's MAC addresses

Properties.Name: DnsNames
Properties.Description: An array of DNS names

Properties.Name: DependencyAgentVersion
Properties.Description: The version number of the dependency agent on the server.

Properties.Name: OperatingSystemFamily
Properties.Description: Value will be windows or linux

Properties.Name: OperatingSystemFullName
Properties.Description: The full name of the operating system

Properties.Name: PhysicalMemoryMB
Properties.Description: The physical memory in MB

Properties.Name: Cpus
Properties.Description: The number of CPUs

Properties.Name: CpuSpeed
Properties.Description: The CPU speed in MHz

Properties.Name: VirtualMachineType
Properties.Description: hyperv vmware xen and so on

Properties.Name: VirtualMachineNativeId
Properties.Description: The native id of the server.

Properties.Name: VirtualMachineNativeName
Properties.Description: The name of the VM

Properties.Name: VirtualMachineHypervisorId
Properties.Description: The hypervisor id of the server.

Properties.Name: HypervisorType
Properties.Description: The hypervisor type of the server.

Properties.Name: HypervisorId
Properties.Description: The hypervisor id of the server.

Properties.Name: HostingProvider
Properties.Description: The hosting provider for the server

Properties.Name: AzureSubscriptionId
Properties.Description: The subscription ID of the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.

Properties.Name: AzureResourceGroup
Properties.Description: The resource group for the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.

Properties.Name: AzureResourceName
Properties.Description: The Azure name for the resource.

Properties.Name: AzureLocation
Properties.Description: The location of the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.

Properties.Name: AzureUpdateDomain
Properties.Description: The update domain of the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.

Properties.Name: AzureFaultDomain
Properties.Description: The fault domain for the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.

Properties.Name: AzureVmId
Properties.Description: The Azure ID of the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.

Properties.Name: AzureSize
Properties.Description: The size of the Azure VM.Â Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.

Properties.Name: AzureImagePublisher
Properties.Description: The publisher of the VM image used on the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.

Properties.Name: AzureImageOffering
Properties.Description: The description of the image used on the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.

Properties.Name: AzureImageSku
Properties.Description: The sku for the VM image used on the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.

Properties.Name: AzureImageVersion
Properties.Description: The image version used on the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.

Properties.Name: AzureCloudServiceName
Properties.Description: For cloud services the service name of the server.

Properties.Name: AzureCloudServiceDeployment
Properties.Description: For cloud services the deployment id of the server.

Properties.Name: AzureCloudServiceRoleName
Properties.Description: For cloud services the role name of the server.

Properties.Name: AzureCloudServiceRoleType
Properties.Description: For cloud services the role type of the server.

Properties.Name: AzureCloudServiceInstanceId
Properties.Description: For cloud services the instance name of the server.

Properties.Name: AzureVmScaleSetName
Properties.Description: For scale sets the name of the scale set.

Properties.Name: AzureVmScaleSetDeployment
Properties.Description: For scale sets the deployment id of the server.

Properties.Name: AzureVmScaleSetResourceId
Properties.Description: For scale sets the resource id of the scale set.

Properties.Name: AzureVmScaleSetInstanceId
Properties.Description: For scale sets the instance id of the server.

Properties.Name: AzureServiceFabricClusterId
Properties.Description: For service fabric clusters the cluster id of the server.

Properties.Name: AzureServiceFabricClusterName
Properties.Description: For service fabric clusters the cluster name.

Properties.Name: TenantId
Properties.Description: ID of the workspace that stores this record

Properties.Name: SourceSystem
Properties.Description: The source of the data collected (Insights)
